tool_description: Renders house division lines and house numbers on the natal chart wheel using calculated house cusps.

house_x_coords.description: X coordinates for house cusp positions

house_y_coords.description: Y coordinates for house cusp positions

error_messages: Invalid house coordinates: Must provide exactly 12 pairs of house cusp coordinates.
Missing center coordinates: Chart center coordinates are required for drawing house lines.
Coordinate validation failed: All coordinates must be numeric values.
usage: Input house cusp coordinates from Chart Coordinate Mapper and chart center from Chart Canvas Generator. Draws house division lines from center to edge of chart.

houses_drawn.description: Number of house boundary lines drawn

numbers_placed.description: Whether house numbers were successfully placed

drawing_status.description: Status message about house boundary rendering
